PartyFinancialAssetLien.name: PartyFinancialAssetLien
PartyFinancialAssetLien.description: Represents information about the lien of the financial asset owned by an individual or account.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the lien is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

LienHolder.description: The name of the lien holder.

MaturityDate.description: The maturity date of the lien.

Name.description: The name of the party financial asset lien.

PartyFinancialAssetId.description: The financial asset associated with the lien.
